verbs.description: [ARG0: Barack Obama] [V: issued] [ARG1: a long statement outlining his objections to President Trump ’s decision to withdraw the U.S. from the Iran nuclear deal] .
Barack Obama issued [ARG0: a long statement] [V: outlining] [ARG1: his objections to President Trump ’s decision to withdraw the U.S. from the Iran nuclear deal] .
Barack Obama issued a long statement outlining his objections to President Trump ’s decision to [V: withdraw] [ARG1: the U.S.] [ARG2: from the Iran nuclear deal] .
